channel.title: ggplot on Mark Needham

item.title: R: ggplot - Displaying multiple charts with a for loop
R/ggplot: Controlling X axis order
item.description: As part of a talk I gave at the Neo4j London meetup earlier this week I wanted to show how you could build a simple chart showing the number of friends that different actors had using the ggplot library. I started out with the following code: df = read.csv("/tmp/friends.csv") top = df %>% head(20) ggplot(aes(x = p.name, y = colleagues), data = top) + geom_bar(fill = "dark blue", stat = "
